subject: Very Urgent......
body:
Dear Friend,
I am a Consultant here in Europe and one of my clients is interested in
investing in your Country hence we decided to contact you for advice on how
we can go about such an investment.

We believe you are an honest, sincere and capable person who can invest the
funds USD$15M on his behalf as a proxy.

I will give you further details as soon as I hear from you.

Yours Sincerely,
Mr.James Taylor

subject: Re: Very Urgent......
body:
Hello Taylor,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm flattered by your trust in my capabilities and honesty. It's great to hear that your client is interested in investing in my country.

Could you please provide more details about the type of investment your client is considering? Also, it would be helpful to know what kind of advice or assistance you're seeking from me.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wanda
